THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
07.01.2021, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

eee
Crl1.MC.No.5176 OF 2014 Qe, 202UKERIO93
ORDER
Dated this the 7th day of January 2021
The prayer in this Criminal M.C. is to quash the
proceedings in Crime No.137/2014 of Sholayar Police
Station. Being a Criminal M.C. of the year 2014,
pertaining to a crime of 2014, a report was called for
from the jurisdictional Court. It is reported by the
Special Judge for SC/ST (POA) Act case, Mannarkkad
that, the police, on completion of investigation, has
filed a refer report finding the allegations to be false.
Therefore, nothing survives for consideration
and accordingly, the Criminal M.C. is closed.
Sd/-
V.G.ARUN
SB/07/01/2021 JUDGE
